EmailTemplate.subject: 我們未能處理您的更改菜單需求 Your Menu update request could not be processed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
親愛的夥伴 您好：
感謝您的填寫。很抱歉為加速菜單調整的時間，請單一店鋪的夥伴們直接進入您的餐廳後台修改您菜單內容。您的菜單修改需求將於三個工作天內完成審核。
常用連結參考如下：
- 點擊 這裡 登入您餐廳平台即可開始使用菜單管理功能 https://foodpanda.portal.restaurant/menu-management-pd
- 點擊 這裡 進一步了解餐廳平台使用指南 https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1CqdX9m1PzFVV5_XKLpmOAeldNJAGeO2AAwk1Vn63WxM/edit?usp=sharing
- 如果忘記密碼，請點擊 這裡 https://foodpanda.portal.restaurant/reset-password
- 由此了解詳細登入資訊 https://foodpandasg.formstack.com/forms/foodpanda_support_tw
感謝您的配合，謝謝 foodpanda
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Dear Partner,
Thank you for your submission. Unfortunately we cannot process your request. Please head on over to Menu Management in Restaurant Portal to update your menu with just a few clicks. Your request will be reviewed within 2 business days by our Quality Control team.
- Click here to log in to Menu Management https://foodpanda.portal.restaurant/menu-management-pd
- Click here if you forgot your password https://foodpanda.portal.restaurant/reset-password
- Request for your login details here https://foodpandasg.formstack.com/forms/foodpanda_support_tw
Cheers,
Your foodpanda team
